text: "King of the World" is a song by American contemporary Christian music singer and songwriter Natalie Grant. It was released on April 29, 2016, as the second single from her ninth studio album, Be One (2015). The song was written by Grant, Becca Mizell, and Sam Mizell. ==Accolades== The song was nominated for the Best Contemporary Christian Music Performance/Song at the 59th Annual Grammy Awards. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- ! scope="row"| US Christian AC (Billboard) | 4 |- !scope="row"| US Christian AC Indicator (Billboard) | 7 |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| Ref. |- ! scope="row" rowspan="2"| United States | November 13, 2015 | Digital download | rowspan="2"| Curb | |- | April 29, 2016 | Christian radio | |- |} ==References== Category:2016 singles Category:2016 songs Category:Curb Records singles Category:Natalie Grant songs Category:Songs written by Sam Mizell
title: King of the World (Natalie Grant song)
